mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OCS_DEV_APP_LIST( DEV_ID, APP_KEY, APP_NAME, APP_TYPE, DIVIDE_SCALE, APP_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARK ) VALUES( #{devId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{divideScale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, DEV_ID as devId, APP_KEY as appKey, APP_NAME as appName, APP_TYPE as appType, DIVIDE_SCALE as divideScale, APP_STATUS as appStatus, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark, RID as rid, PACKAGE_NAME as pagName FROM APP_RLN_VIEW c WHERE c.ID=#{id}
